What is Pig Latin?

Pig Latin is a playful language game in which the first consonant (or consonant cluster) of a word is moved to the end of the word and -ay is added to the end. For example, in Pig Latin, "cat" becomes "cataway" and "frog" becomes "froggway".

Pig Latin is often used as a simple cipher or code, and it can be fun to use when you want to communicate with someone in a way that is a bit more secretive or playful. It's also a great way to practice language skills and to get creative with language!
